body:
After 3 years of getting banned from the Avicus server I am finally back, I have missed this server soooo much and cannot wait for an amazing summer!!

For those who were a regular on the Avicus server 3 years ago my old username was Samcjp, but I changed it to Skillz999 about a year ago.

Btw I am much more mature now and know from this experience alone that hacking is 'bad'. A bit of info about me I'm 18 years old and have just finished my first year at uni so cannot wait for a 13 week summer break!

title: I am finally back!

replies.body: Wow 3 years. A lot of things have changed. A lot of things. Welcome back!
